title: Shutdown Fullcast 7.02 - Rowdy Boys and the NFL Draft
description:
It's NFL Draft week, so we asked for your uninformed and inflammatory opinions about the World's Most Televised Job Fair that we might agree with them, or disagree, or just talk about something else altogether. Such takes include!
- The Kansas City Chiefs should never draft a quarterback in the first round
- Vandy's Zach Cunningham will be the player college fans correctly think fell way too far
- The Draft is bad and so is league parity
- The Browns should trade the first pick for Bill Belichick
- Draft order should be determined by each team sending a player to the Combine to compete
- Spencer definitely knows what he's doing as a dad
